name: Lets explore the nature with cooling retrest at Fraser's Hill
description:
Fraser's Hill is a highland destination nestled among the mountains, about 2 hours drive away from Kuala Lumpur.It has an average altitude of 1,200 meters high. It was named after Louis James Fraser a solitary Scottish pioneer who found opportunities at the rich tin deposit at Fraser's Hill. Locally known as Bukit Fraser, it is popular for its nature activities and cooling climate. It also has lots of colonial building which your camera going to like it very much.

If you are the fans of nature walk, then you would be very pleased as Fraser's Hill offers many type of trails which you can choose the ideal one for you and your partner. Apart from that,bird watching is a must activity for the bird's lover as Fraser's Hills has over 250 different species of birds.

Other attractions are Jeriau Waterfall, Allan's Water, Golf, Clock Tower, Public Park, Paddock and Smokehouse that serve good English scone for tea time.

Overall, Fraser's Hill is a perfect place either just relaxing and enjoy the cool fresh air or venture into any nature activity.
